#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <vector>
#include <string.h>
#include <string>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <math.h>
#include <limits>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main(){

	int N;
	int X,Y;
	scanf("%d\n", &N);
	scanf("%d %d\n", &X, &Y);
	vector<int> a(N+1, 0);
	int temp;
	for (int i =1; i <= N; ++i){
		scanf("%d", &(a[i]));
		--a[i];
	}
	
	int W = Y - X;

	vector< int > d(W+1, 0);

	for (int i = 1; i <= N; ++i){
		for (int c = a[i]; c <= W; ++c)
			d[c] = max(d[c], d[c-a[i]] + a[i]);
	}

	if (d[W] == W){
		printf("POSSIBLE");
	}
	else{
		printf("IMPOSSIBLE");
	}

	return 0;
}
